hints.content:
There are $\blueD{9}$ groups with $\maroonD{7}$ suns each.

![9 groups of 7 suns](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a9cfce2497935c5c188e373442f2dc8e89bf5836)

The expression $\blueD{9} \times \maroonD{7}$ represents the picture.

There are $63$ total suns.

We can rearrange those same $63$ suns to show $\maroonD{7}$ groups with $\blueD{9}$ suns in each.

![7 groups of 9 suns](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/730ec6d33bc65d8019977d25243af35ae8b6ae2f)

The expression $\maroonD{7} \times \blueD{9}$ also represents the picture.

[[☃ explanation 1]]
We can represent the picture with the expressions $\blueD{9} \times \maroonD{7}$ and $\maroonD{7} \times \blueD{9}$.

question.content:
**Which two expressions represent the following picture?**

![9 groups of 7 suns](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a9cfce2497935c5c188e373442f2dc8e89bf5836)

[[☃ radio 1]]
